import React, { Component } from 'react' import CourseService from '../../Services/courseService' import { notify } from '../notify/Notify'; let courseService = new CourseService() export default class CourseItem extends Component { onDeleteCourse = () => { console.log(this.props.course.maKhoaHoc); courseService.deleteCourse(this.props.course.maKhoaHoc).then(res => { this.props.dispatch(this.props.course.maKhoaHoc) notify("", "Xóa thành công") }).catch(err => { notify("", "Khóa học đã ghi danh học viên nên ko thể xóa") }) } render() { let { course } = this.props return (
{course.tenKhoaHoc}
development
Toan Nguyen
Admin
10/10/2019
) } }
